phrasalVerbs.exampleFull: He HEATED the soup UP in the microwave.
phrasalVerbs.exampleFullUnderscore: He ______ the soup __ in the microwave.

phrasalVerbs.meaning: Choose to be a member or part of something.

phrasalVerbs.exampleFull: I really had to DRILL DOWN to get the answers from the database.
phrasalVerbs.exampleFullUnderscore: I really had to _____ ____ to get the answers from the database.
phrasalVerbs.meaning: Search through layers of information on a computer.

phrasalVerbs.exampleFull: Things are SHAPING UP at work - everything's going well again.
phrasalVerbs.exampleFullUnderscore: Things are _______ __ at work - everything's going well again.

phrasalVerb.meaning: A phrase that was used a greeting.
